New Records: Juan Soto reached 199 career home runs, joining an elite group of players with 200 or more home runs
Key Match Events: The game went into extra innings with the Yankees defeating the Royals 4-3
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees moved to 84-62, leading the American League East by 1.5 games; the Royals were in a playoff race with a 80-67 record
Others: The article provided historical context about Juan Soto's achievements and his impact on the season
